all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, beware lest ye are deceived; and that ye may not be deceived seek ye earnestly the best gifts, always remembering for what they are given;
Doctrine and Covenants 46:8
Quote of the Day
"Jesus Christ … didn’t simply sympathize with our imperfections. … No, He went beyond that, infinitely beyond that."
Dale G. Renlund | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
